narrative:
NO NON-COMPLIANT ITEMS WERE IDENTIFIED DURING THIS INSPECTION.
Applicant meets all requirements to be licensed as an A - Breeder. The license fee will be mailed by the applicant
to: USDA, APHIS, Animal Care 
Western Region Office 
2150 Centre Avenue, Building B

Fort Collins, CO 80526-8117
The following requirements were explained to the applicant: 
License renewal requirements and procedure
Record-keeping requirements
The Program of Veterinary Care (PVC)
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL THE USDA LICENSE IS ISSUED.
